metadata.title: CVE-2023-49208 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
scheme/webauthn.c in Glewlwyd SSO server before 2.7.6 has a possible bufferoverflow during FIDO2 credentials validation in webauthn registration.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-49208` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

glewlwyd - 2.7.6+ds-1
glewlwyd-common - 2.7.6+ds-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: glewlwyd package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.7.6+ds-1').
